title: MPMDManager
extendedDescription: An abstraction layer built on top of MPI that simplifies development of parallel programs in MPMD (Multiple Program Multiple Data) environments by providing intuitive functions for program identification, communication, and coordination.

features.name: MPI Abstraction
features.description: Complete lifecycle management for parallel programs with MPI abstraction layers.

features.name: Smart Connections
features.description: Reliable communication with configurable retry and error resilience.

features.name: Language Parity
features.description: Identical C/Python APIs with seamless cross-language compatibility.
